com.opensymphony.xwork2.validator
Interface ValidatorContext

All Superinterfaces:
LocaleProvider, TextProvider, ValidationAware
All Known Implementing Classes:
DelegatingValidatorContext, VisitorFieldValidator.AppendingValidatorContext
public interface ValidatorContext
extends ValidationAware, TextProvider, LocaleProvider

The context for validation. This interface extends others to provide methods for reporting errors and messages as well as looking up error messages in a resource bundle using a specific locale.

Author:
Jason Carreira

Method Detail

getFullFieldName

String getFullFieldName(String fieldName)
Translates a simple field name into a full field name in OGNL syntax.
